audioText: Il semblerait que la réunion soit reportée à la semaine prochaine.
question: What does the speaker suggest about the meeting?
options: It seems to be postponed to next week
It will definitely happen this week
It needs more participants to attend
explanation: The text states 'Il semblerait que la réunion soit reportée à la semaine prochaine' - It would seem that the meeting is postponed to next week. The conditional 'semblerait' expresses uncertainty or politeness when suggesting something.
